message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. I think this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for my budget.  While I recognize the product's unique value, I'm only able to offer $1200000 at this time.  Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1200000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1600000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and rarity.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1600000 is closer to what I can afford, I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to offer $1400000. This is my final offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise considering the value of the product.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1500000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1350000. This is my final counteroffer.
